Ray Allen

Walter Ray Allen

(Ray-Ray, Sugar Ray, Jesus Shuttlesworth, Skinny Walt, Gentleman)

Position: Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-5, 205lb (196cm, 92kg)

Born: July 20, 1975 in Merced, California us

College: UConn

High School: Hillcrest in Dalzell, South Carolina

Draft: Minnesota Timberwolves, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 1996 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 1, 1996

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2018 (Full List)

Career Length: 18 years

  • Hall of Fame
  • 10x All Star
  • 2x NBA Champ
  • 2x All-NBA
  • 1996-97 All-Rookie
  • 2002-03 Sportsmanship
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Ray Allen?

Ray Allen is 49 years old.

Where was Ray Allen born?

Ray Allen was born in Merced, California.

When was Ray Allen born?

Ray Allen was born on July 20, 1975.

How tall is Ray Allen?

Ray Allen is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

How much did Ray Allen weigh when playing?

Ray Allen weighed 205 lbs (92 kg) when playing.

Is Ray Allen in the Hall of Fame?

Ray Allen was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2018 (Full List) .

When was Ray Allen drafted?

Ray Allen was drafted by Minnesota Timberwolves, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 1996 NBA Draft.

What position did Ray Allen play?

Shooting Guard.

When did Ray Allen retire?

Ray Allen last played in 2014.

What is Ray Allen's net worth?

Ray Allen made at least $184,356,410 playing professional basketball.

How much did Ray Allen make?

Ray Allen made $18,776,860 in 2010.

What did Ray Allen average?

Ray Allen averaged 18.9 points, 4.1 rebounds, and 3.4 assists per game.

How many rings does Ray Allen have?

Ray Allen won 2 championships.

What is Ray Allen's Twitter account?

Ray Allen is on Twitter at greenRAYn20.

What schools did Ray Allen attend?

Ray Allen attended Hillcrest in Dalzell, South Carolina and UConn.

What are Ray Allen's nicknames?

Ray-Ray, Sugar Ray, Jesus Shuttlesworth, Skinny Walt, Gentleman are nicknames for Ray Allen.
